scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo-ng.ios: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios
scripts.demo-ng.ios.bundled: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --bundle
scripts.demo-push.ios: npm run preparedemo-push && cd ../demo-push && tns run ios
scripts.demo-push.ios.release: npm run preparedemo-push && cd ../demo-push && tns build ios --release --for-device
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && rimraf platforms/android && tns run android
scripts.demo.android.linked: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo-ng.android: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.demo-ng.android.build: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns build android
scripts.demo-ng.android.bundled: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --bundle
scripts.demo-push.android: npm run preparedemo-push && cd ../demo-push && tns run android
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.test.ios.device: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios
scripts.preparedemo: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns install
scripts.preparedemo-ng: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-plugin-firebase && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns install
scripts.preparedemo-push: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-push && tns plugin remove nativescript-plugin-firebase && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns install
scripts.setupandinstall: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../demo-ng && npm i && cd ../demo-push && npm i && cd ../src && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin add ../src  && cd ../demo-push && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
scripts.ci.tslint: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-plugin-firebase && cd ../src
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo-ng && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo-ng/typings!'
scripts.generate.typings.android: echo '##### Download the latest relevant .aar file from https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.google.firebase, rename .aar to .zip and extract it. Then move classes.jar to the plugin /src folder' && java -jar ../../android-dts-generator/dts-generator/build/libs/dts-generator.jar -input ./classes.jar -output platforms/android/typings/$npm_package_config_typings && rimraf classes.jar && echo '##### Done! Deleted src/classes.jar, and generated typings in src/platforms/android/typings/'
